body_html: +1. A MatchingFilesDataset would be very useful in this case, and it could replace the current implementation of Dataset.list_files(). For bonus points, it would be great if it had the option to yield results in sorted order, since the underlying OS might not guarantee this.
body_text: +1. A MatchingFilesDataset would be very useful in this case, and it could replace the current implementation of Dataset.list_files(). For bonus points, it would be great if it had the option to yield results in sorted order, since the underlying OS might not guarantee this.
body: +1. A `MatchingFilesDataset` would be very useful in this case, and it could replace the current implementation of `Dataset.list_files()`. For bonus points, it would be great if it had the option to yield results in sorted order, since the underlying OS might not guarantee this.
